Job Title: Accounting and Business Analyst

Location: Monroeville, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
The OpportunityEnergy Swing Windows and Doors (Murrysville) is an established and growing replacement window and door company with a twenty-five-year history and a strong brand. This growth has created the need for us to seek out an experienced Accounting and Business Analyst.
Company OverviewEnergy Swing is a totally different kind or window and Door company. We are the only four-time recipient of the Western Pennsylvania Better Business Bureau's Torch Award for Business Ethics in dealing with employees, customers, and the community. It takes the right people to deliver that kind of performance. A Company is only as good as its people, and we value the people on our team.
We have built a strong customer-focused culture of doing the “Right things right” and delivering value to our customers, who are individual homeowners. We are looking for a unique marketing professional who understands and can convey our values and culture to our target consumer market. Our business is all about trust. This trust is why 63% of our business comes from referrals and repeat customers, three times the industry average,
If you want to be part of a strong team with strong customer and employee culture, this is the perfect position for you!
Key Responsibilities Include:Assist Controller with day-to-day accounting operationsMaintain accurate and up-to-date financial records by entering data into accounting software and spreadsheets.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure accurate financial reportingAddress inquiries and concerns from vendors and internal stakeholders regarding disbursements promptly and professionallyAssist with accounts payable and receivable functions as well as assist in data analysis and auditing of accounting system files · · Maintains subsidiary accounts by verifying, allocating, and posting transactions.Reviews billing statements, invoices, and similar documents for accuracy; alerts supervisory staff of any Perform bank reconciliations and ensure accuracy of financial data.· Assist with month-end and year-end closing processes Support the preparation of tax returns and compliance with tax regulations· · Assist in the creation of financial statements and annual reports.Learn and understand company’s CRM system for data retrieval and analysis.Provide occasional support to the company President.
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree or equivalent experienceExceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholdersDiscussions involve confidentiality and discretion, requiring diplomacy and tact in communicationProblem-solving mindset, with the ability to identify process improvements · · Maintain confidentiality of all Confidential Information of clients and of the company.A commitment to accuracy with a keen eye for detailTake a customer focused team-centric approach (we're better together)Coach-able, Flexible, AccountableExperience with QuickBooks is requiredProficient in Microsoft 365 applications (Excel, Word, and Outlook) is requiredOutstanding communication/collaboration and time management skills
Competencies:Problem Solving – Identifies and resolves problems in a timely manner; gathers and analyzes information skillfully; develops alternative solutions; uses reasonWritten Communication – Writes and speaks clearly and informatively; edits work for spelling and grammar; able to read and interpret written information including an understanding of basic accounting terminologyPlanning/Organizing – Prioritizes and plans work activities; uses time efficiently, plans for additional resources; sets goals and objectivesAttention to Detail – Accurately and efficiently enters data into computer software into computer systems. Recognize and correct discrepancies related to invoicing and other business transactionsQuality – Demonstrates accuracy and thoroughness; looks for ways to improve and promote quality throughout the companyAdaptability – Adapts to changes in the work environment; changes approach or method to best fit the situation; able to deal with changes, delays, or unexpected events
Reports to Company Controller·  Benefits: $20.00 - $25.00/hour (commensurate with experience)Simple IRA program plus company matching.Paid Time Off and Paid Holidays

Experience Level (if available): None
